T02D1754:214b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la mandala bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D1754:214b-3: dpal nag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D1754:214b-4: dpal nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1754:214b-5: gang zhig lus ni grangs med pa yi //
T02D1754:214b-6: sna tshogs rnams su sprul par mdzad nas //
T02D1754:214b-7: 'jig rten pa yi don rnams phyed phyir //
T02D1754:214b-8: de bas nag po chen por skyabs mchi //
T02D1754:214b-9: dpal ldan nag po chen po'i rgyud kyi //
T02D1754:214b-10: bya ba'i cho ga rim pa bzhin du //
T02D1754:214b-11: gzhung de nyung bar bsdus pa las ni //
T02D1754:214b-12: cho ga rdzogs par shes par bya phyir //
T02D1754:214b-13: rgyud gzhan dag tu bshad pa ltar du //
T02D1754:214b-14: cho ga blangs nas sdeb pa'i ming ni //
T02D1754:214b-15: dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya'i //
T02D1754:214b-16: bdag gi dkyil 'khor cho ga de bsgrags //
T02D1754:214b-17: 'dir 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas ma rig
T02D1754:214b-18: pa la sogs pa'i tha gus shes rab bcings pa
T02D1754:214b-19: / dka' ba spyad na 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho spang bar nus pas //
T02D1754:214b-20: steng dang 'og tu 'gro ba'i lus can rnams la //
T02D1754:214b-21: dbang bskur bar 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1754:214b-22: don du tshogs gnyis las yang dag par dad pa
T02D1754:214b-23: dang ldan pa / mang du thos pa //
T02D1754:214b-27: brtson 'grus dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i slob dpon
T02D1754:214b-28: gyis gdul bya yang dag par gdon pa'i sbam pa
T02D1754:214b-29: dang bcas te / rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1754:214b-30: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba la sogs pa'i cho
T02D1754:214b-32: de yang slob ma dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'am /
T02D1754:214b-33: rang ngam gzhan gyi dngos grub sgrub pa la sogs pa'am /
T02D1754:214b-34: sems can gyi don chen po mthong ba rnams kyi don du dkyil 'khor bri ba la /
T02D1754:214b-35: tshogs sogs la sogs shes pas sngon du //
T02D1754:214b-36: bsnyen pas bgegs rnams brlag par bya ba //
T02D1754:214b-37: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes pa yis //
T02D1754:214b-38: bsnyen med dngos grub med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1754:214b-39: de phyir bsdad la gnyid spangs nas ni //
T02D1754:214b-40: rim bzang de nyid shes pa de yis //
T02D1754:214b-41: lha yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste //
T02D1754:214b-42: dal gyur de sngags rgyun du brjod do //
T02D1754:214b-43: 'khor lo'i gtso bo 'bum du bzlas nas //
T02D1754:214b-44: rang nyid lha la yang ni 'bum bzlas //
T02D1754:214b-45: 'khor rnams la ni khri phrag re re //
T02D1754:214b-46: sngon 'gro'i bsnyen par 'di la brjod do //
T02D1754:214b-47: lha bskyed pa dang sngags rnams kyi rim pa ni mngon rtogs ltar bya ste /
T02D1754:214b-48: mangs kyis dogs pas 'dir ma spros so //
T02D1754:215a-0: de ltar sngon du bsnyen pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa @215a * //
T02D1754:215a-1: dkyil 'khor gyi lha gsal bar 'dod pas 'khor lo la brtan par gnas te /
T02D1754:215a-2: 'khor lo'i gnad pa byin ba'am ma byin pas slob ma gzung ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1754:215a-3: 'di ni sngon du bya ba'i cho ga ste bsnyen pa'o //
T02D1754:215a-4: de nas ston zla tha chungs dang dgun zla tha chung sa la sogs pa rnams la /
T02D1754:215a-5: dge ba'i dus tshod shes par byas pa dang /
T02D1754:215a-6: lan gnyis sam gsum du slob mas gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1754:215a-7: dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod pa de'i tshogs pa ma tshang bar gyur na /
T02D1754:215a-8: de'i tshe de dag gi lte ba'i nyi ma'i steng
T02D1754:215a-9: gi h'um gi 'od zer gyis snying ga'i kam yongs
T02D1754:215a-10: su gyur pa las sdig pa kha dog nag po
T02D1754:215a-15: sha za lha bu cig sna bu gnas byung ste /
T02D1754:215a-16: h'um snying gar 'phros pas rdo rje h'um mdzad du gyur nas de phyir phyung la /
T02D1754:215a-17: aom sum bha nam sum bha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1754:215a-18: aom gri hna gri hna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1754:215a-19: aom gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1754:215a-20: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a
T02D1754:215a-21: dza che ge mo'i sarba b'a pam n'a sha ya
T02D1754:215a-22: h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a zhes brjod cing /
T02D1754:215a-23: lag pa'i rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis phyir thon pa'i sdig pa stong par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1754:215a-24: aom a'a:sham ka re shanti ka re ghutta ghutti ni /
T02D1754:215a-27: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1754:215a-28: che ge mo raksha sv'ah'a h'um zhes brjod de yang
T02D1754:215a-29: dag par bsrungs la bdud rtsi kha sbyor gyi sngags
T02D1754:215a-30: kyang bzlas so // de ltar byas na de la
T02D1754:215a-31: bgegs mi 'jug cing tshogs pa che yang tshegs med
T02D1754:215a-33: 'di ni slob ma gzung ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:215a-35: // / de nas dge ba'i nyi ma'i thun la sogs
T02D1754:215a-36: pa'i bye brag las sngags dro'i dus su nye bar
T02D1754:215a-37: longs spyod pa'i rdzas rnams bsog la /
T02D1754:215a-38: bya ba la mkhas pa'i grogs dang bcas pas dkyil
T02D1754:215a-39: 'khor gtso bo dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba la legs
T02D1754:215a-40: par gnas te / shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams kyi skyon spang la /
T02D1754:215a-44: skyed mos tshal lam lha khang ngam /
T02D1754:215a-45: khang pa rnams las gang yid dang mthun pa'i byang
T02D1754:215a-46: shar mtshams su shar dang byang gzhol ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:215a-47: gyi sa gzhi legs par bcas la dri la sogs
T02D1754:215a-48: pas byugs te / dkyil 'khor gyi lha legs par mchod nas /
T02D1754:215a-49: gtor ma gtang ba dang nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D1754:215b-0: de na gnas pa'i zhing skyong la sogs @215b pa rnams la gtor ma dang /
T02D1754:215b-1: mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba ni /
T02D1754:215b-2: 'di na gnas pa'i lha klu gang dag rnams //
T02D1754:215b-3: gnod sbyin srin po rnams sam gzhan dag la //
T02D1754:215b-4: sa gzhi de nyid bdag ni zhu ba yis //
T02D1754:215b-5: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i don du de stsol cig /
T02D1754:215b-6: ces pa la sogs pa lan gsum dang bcas pa
T02D1754:215b-7: ste / rmi lam la sogs par de rnams kyis
T02D1754:215b-8: gnang ba dang mi gnang bar go bar byas nas
T02D1754:215b-9: ste / / las thams cad pa'i sngags zlos bzhin
T02D1754:215b-10: pas nyungs kar dang chu dang thal bas bsangs la
T02D1754:215b-11: ste / / // der rdo rje skyil mo krung
T02D1754:215b-12: bcas te sa'i lha mo la zhabs bsil dang zhal
T02D1754:215b-13: bsil aargha dang mchod pa rnams sngon du song bas
T02D1754:215b-14: ste / / // / skyob pa la sogs pa lan gsum brjod pas snyam gsan phab pa dang /
T02D1754:215b-15: de ltar bgyi'o zhes pa smra bzhin pa de yid kyis nam mkha' la bteg la /
T02D1754:215b-16: phyis sa gzhi de la bgegs med par byas nas gtor ma byin pa dang /
T02D1754:215b-17: sa bdag klu'i lto bar rab 'bring tha ma'i dbye
T02D1754:215b-18: bas lte brkyed pa bus mo nub pa tsam pa'i
T02D1754:215b-20: 'di ni sa brko ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1754:215b-21: de nas thal ba la sogs pa bsal te /
T02D1754:215b-22: dri zhim pa'i chus gtor la legs par bkang ba dang /
T02D1754:215b-23: h'um zhes pa dang las thams cad pa'i sngags zlos
T02D1754:215b-24: shing dri'i chu de nyid du gtor zhing bcag go
T02D1754:215b-25: // khru phyed pa sa gzhi mnyam pa cung zad
T02D1754:215b-26: rus sbal gyi rgyab 'dra ba yid tsam shar dang
T02D1754:215b-27: byang du gzhol ba'i sa stegs bca'o //
T02D1754:215b-29: ro yi skyon ni ma lus pa //
T02D1754:215b-30: gdon par nus par ma gyur na //
T02D1754:215b-31: lag pa gzhag la sngags bzlas te //
T02D1754:215b-32: de las dag pa gzhan yod min //
T02D1754:215b-33: khang bzang rdo stags grub thob 'brog / lha khang la sogs rgya mtsho'i 'gram //
T02D1754:215b-34: sngon du bcas pa'i gnas de rnams //
T02D1754:215b-35: ma sbyangs pas na dag pa'o //
T02D1754:215b-36: de la aom bhu khi zhes pas nam mkhar bya ba'o //
T02D1754:215b-37: h'um lam h'um zhes pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsams la /
T02D1754:215b-38: aom me di n'i badzra bha ba bandha h'um gis
T02D1754:215b-39: lag pa sa la bzhag la byin gyis brlabs te
T02D1754:215b-40: / sa gzhi de nyid la gtor ma dang zhabs bsil la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /
T02D1754:215b-41: aom a'a: h'um zhes brjod nas nam mkha' la bteg pa'i lha rnams spyan drang ngo //
T02D1754:215b-42: 'di ni sa sbyang pa gnyis kyi bye brag gi cho ga'o /
T02D1754:215b-44: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsdad la rdo rje dril bu dang bcas te /
T02D1754:215b-45: dpal nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas spos kyi snod bzung la /
T02D1754:216a-0: h'um las rdo rje'i lce dang @216a * //
T02D1754:216a-2: phyogs kun du ni gnas pa yi //
T02D1754:216a-3: sangs rgyas rnams la bdag bltas nas //
T02D1754:216a-4: 'dir ni rdo rje che ge bdag / dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs lags pas //
T02D1754:216a-5: spyon cig sangs rgyas la sogs rnams //
T02D1754:216a-6: 'dir ni dngos grub gnang bar zhu //
T02D1754:216a-7: zhes pas sangs rgyas la sogs ba rnams la snyan gsan phab nas /
T02D1754:216a-9: nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1754:216a-10: la sogs pa rnams kyis bdag nyid la gnang ba
T02D1754:216a-12: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i spro ba la
T02D1754:216a-13: sogs pa sngon du song bas bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:216a-14: de ; rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcas te //
T02D1754:216a-15: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba'i rtse mo sprad nas thur du phyogs pas spyi gtsug tu gzung la /
T02D1754:216a-16: aom badzra au tishtha zhes pa brjod pas nam mkhar bteg ste skyil krung bshig nas /
T02D1754:216a-17: shar du kha phyogs rkang pa gshibs te langs pa dang /
T02D1754:216a-18: spyi gtsug tu thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag btsal lo //
T02D1754:216a-19: ma rig pa'i mun pas bsgribs pas bdud kyi byin
T02D1754:216a-20: gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams la nye bar dmigs
T02D1754:216a-21: te / de rnams kyi bdud rnams brlag par bya ba'i don du //
T02D1754:216a-22: skad cig gis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sku khros
T02D1754:216a-23: pas gnas pa khro gnyer dang bcas pa mche ba
T02D1754:216a-24: gtsigs pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas /
T02D1754:216a-25: mig g-yas phyogs dang g-yon phyogs su ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba'o //
T02D1754:216a-26: de gnyis la h'um las 'jig pa'i dus kyi me
T02D1754:216a-27: dang mtshungs pa'i mig 'bras bsams pa'i rdo rje'i lta
T02D1754:216a-28: stangs kyis phyogs thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnams la
T02D1754:216a-29: lta zhing da rgyal bskyed pa ni /
T02D1754:216a-30: slob dpon bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1754:216a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyang bdag / sangs rgyas
T02D1754:216a-32: rgyal po chen po bdag / bdag ni stobs chen
T02D1754:216a-33: rdo rje can // rje rigs rgyal po rnal 'byor bdag / bdag ni mi 'gyur phyag rdo rje //
T02D1754:216a-35: rkang pa'i 'og tu 'bar bzhin pa'i rdo rje bsams
T02D1754:216a-36: nas skabs su sa gzhi la rdo rje'i dbyibs bya
T02D1754:216a-37: ba ni / rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol
T02D1754:216a-38: pa dang bcas pas rdo rje'i 'gros bya ba ni
T02D1754:216a-39: ba ni / / byang shar mtshams nas g-yas skor
T02D1754:216a-40: du dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par gar bya zhing bskor
T02D1754:216a-41: ba ni / / ro // nyon cig bgegs rnams 'dus pa'i tshogs //
T02D1754:216b-0: lus ngag @216b yid rnams brtan gyur pa'i //
T02D1754:216b-1: bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1754:216b-2: bka' yi 'khor lo rab tu bskul //
T02D1754:216b-3: rgyun du lus la rdor 'bar bas //
T02D1754:216b-4: lus po dum bu gsum du byed //
T02D1754:216b-5: gang dag bdag gis bka' 'das na //
T02D1754:216b-7: zhes pa lan gsum du brjod cing khro bo dpag tu med pa spros te /
T02D1754:216b-9: sa gzhi yang rdo rje'i sa gzhi la thug par
T02D1754:216b-10: h'um las rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab
T02D1754:216b-11: po // de nas sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor me tog
T02D1754:216b-12: la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas lag pas
T02D1754:216b-13: sa la reg la dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo'i sngags
T02D1754:216b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bsdus la nyal lo //
T02D1754:216b-16: 'di ni bgegs bskrad pa'i cho ga ste sa chog go //
T02D1754:216b-17: de ltar bgegs med par bsams nas snga bar langs
T02D1754:216b-18: te rdo rje 'dzin pa'i zhabs la spro ba'i 'gro
T02D1754:216b-19: ba rnams kyi don du skad cig gis stong par
T02D1754:216b-21: ram las nyi ma'i steng du h'um las sna tshogs
T02D1754:216b-22: rdo rje la gnas pa'i h'um gi 'od zer las
T02D1754:216b-23: 'bar bzhin pa'i rdo rje rnams 'bros pas bar mtshams
T02D1754:216b-24: med pa'i rdo rje'i lcags ri dang gur dang gdugs
T02D1754:216b-25: dang bla re rnams 'bar bzhin pa bzod par dka'
T02D1754:216b-26: ba dang / sa gzhi yang sna tshogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1754:216b-27: de'i dbus su skad cig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid du gnas nas /
T02D1754:216b-28: phyi nas rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsams pa'i rang
T02D1754:216b-29: gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu
T02D1754:216b-30: na gnas pa'i bgegs rnams bkug ste /
T02D1754:216b-31: h'um las spros pa'i khro bo de rnams kyis me
T02D1754:216b-32: tog dmar po'i phreng ba btags pa'i phur pa stod
T02D1754:216b-33: rang 'dra ba / smad rtse mo gcig pa'i rnam
T02D1754:216b-34: pa 'jig pa'i dus kyi med dang 'dra ba lag
T02D1754:216b-36: g-yas pas rang gi phyag mtshan yongs su gyur pa
T02D1754:216b-37: las tho ba bzung bar bsams nas h'um ring po
T02D1754:216b-38: brjod pas 'obs su gyur par bcug ste /
T02D1754:216b-39: phyogs skyong de rnams la aom badzra k'i li k'i
T02D1754:216b-40: la ya sarba bighnyam h'um zhes pa brjod cing mgo
T02D1754:216b-42: aom badzra mudka ra a'a ko ta ya h'um zhes
T02D1754:216b-43: brjod cing tho bas brdung bar bsam pa ni slob
T02D1754:217a-1: byang shar mchams [*mtshams] nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1754:217a-2: me ri'i phyi rim nas g-yas skor du phyogs bcur
T02D1754:217a-4: yang na phur pa med par ji ltar bshad pa'i bsam pas phur bu gdab par bya ste /
T02D1754:217a-5: lag pa gan rkyal thur la sbub nas /
T02D1754:217a-6: aom badzra h'um zhes brjod cing sa la brdabs pas bgegs med par bsam mo //
T02D1754:217a-7: 'di ni bgegs la phur pa gdab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1754:217a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i steng du bsdad nas
T02D1754:217a-9: bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge bam las byung
T02D1754:217a-10: ba'i sa'i lha mo bsams te /
T02D1754:217a-11: lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo gsum la zla ba'i steng du h'um gsum dmigs la /
T02D1754:217a-12: sa gzhi la lan gsum brdabs pa'i sgra dang h'um
T02D1754:217a-13: gi 'od zer gyis sa 'og gi ye shes sems
T02D1754:217a-14: dpa' spyan drangs pas byon nas dam tshig pa dang
T02D1754:217a-16: zhi ba na bza' dkar po sku mdog ser po rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D1754:217a-17: gser gyi bum pa bzang po phyag gnyis kyis bzung ba /
T02D1754:217a-18: zhal gcig pa mdun du bzhugs pa la aargha la
T02D1754:217a-19: sogs pas sngon du yang dag par mchod nas myur
T02D1754:217a-20: par / skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D1754:217a-21: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par gyis //
T02D1754:217a-22: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D1754:217a-23: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1754:217a-24: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D1754:217a-25: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar //
T02D1754:217a-26: de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02D1754:217a-27: rgyal bar byas nas dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1754:217a-28: zhes pa lan gsum du brjod de lhag gnas bya'o //
T02D1754:217a-30: zer nas slar de nyid du thim par bsam mo //
T02D1754:217a-31: de nas rdo rje thal mo thur du bcings pas sa gzhi mnan te /
T02D1754:217a-32: aom badzri bha ba h'um zhes pa lan gsum gyis
T02D1754:217a-33: byin gyis brlabs pas rdo rje bcings pa las 'bar
T02D1754:217a-34: bzhin pa'i yi ge h'um spros pa dang /
T02D1754:217a-35: sa gzhi rdo rje'i sa gzhir gyur par bsam pa ni /
T02D1754:217a-36: aom badzra dri dha tishtha zhes pa lan gsum brjod de byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1754:217a-37: des ni sa gzhi bdag nyid kyi dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D1754:217a-38: 'di ni sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:217a-40: // / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi dri zhim
T02D1754:217a-41: pos byugs te me tog gi gcal du bkram nas
T02D1754:217a-42: dgongs ka'i dus su khrus byas la /
T02D1754:217b-0: @217b rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:217b-1: gyi shar phyogs su bsdad nas kha nub tu bltas

T02D1754:217b-3: ldan pas tsandan la sogs pa'i sbos byug mandala byas
T02D1754:217b-4: la dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsgoms nas /

T02D1754:217b-10: byas pa'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan pa stong
T02D1754:217b-11: par bsams te ; / bam las rin po che'i
T02D1754:217b-12: bum pa bsam pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas par
T02D1754:217b-13: bya ba'i don du sa dkar pos byugs pa lha
T02D1754:217b-14: rnams kyi phyag mtshan btab par bdud rtsi lnga dang
T02D1754:217b-16: rin po che dang sman dang 'bru lnga rnams snying por gzhug shing lngas legs par brgyan /
T02D1754:217b-17: phred ba dang bcas pa'i mgul chings ras kha tshar ma nyams ba gnyis kyis bcings la /
T02D1754:217b-18: dri zhim po'i mandala gyi steng du mdun du legs par bzhag ste /
T02D1754:217b-19: h'um lnga bzlas shing zhi ba la sogs pa'i las
T02D1754:217b-20: kyi dbye bas skud pa kha dog lngar byas pa
T02D1754:217b-21: rnams kyis / aom badzra shi kha re ru ta
T02D1754:217b-22: ma ta di sh'i bandha h'um zhes pa'i sngags brjod
T02D1754:217b-23: rnams kyis / cing bskor ro // de rnams kyi nang du /
T02D1754:217b-24: aom tapte ma h'a tapte sv'a h'a zhes pas ye
T02D1754:217b-25: shes kyi chu spyan drangs te skad cig gis lha'i
T02D1754:217b-27: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis
T02D1754:217b-28: ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs nas zhabs bsil
T02D1754:217b-29: la sogs pa phul ba dang /
T02D1754:217b-30: bum pa dang 'khor lo la zhugs pas sngon du
T02D1754:217b-31: bkang ba'i chu dang ro gcig tu bde ba chen
T02D1754:217b-32: por zhu nas byang chub sems kyi gzugs su gyur
T02D1754:217b-33: par bsam zhing / de nas gtso bo'i bum par
T02D1754:217b-34: gtso bo'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas las
T02D1754:217b-35: thams cad pa'i sngags kyis me tog gsum dbul lo
T02D1754:217b-36: par bsam zhing / // de ltar bum pa gzhan
T02D1754:217b-37: rnams la yang rang rang gi sngags nyi shu rtsa
T02D1754:217b-38: gcig gam bdun gyi bar du bzlas so //
T02D1754:217b-39: de ltar me tog rnams dbul lo //
T02D1754:217b-40: sngags ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1754:218a-1: pa la sogs pa me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1754:218a-2: las thams cad ba'i sngags kyis bsrung ba'i don du bsang gtor byas la /
T02D1754:218a-3: 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba ma zin pa'i bar
T02D1754:218a-4: du bgegs srungs shig ces brjod nas gtor ma byin
T02D1754:218a-6: 'di ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:218a-8: // / de nas nub tu kha bltas te dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:218a-9: gyi sa gzhi la 'khor lo'i gtso bo la sogs
T02D1754:218a-10: pa bsgoms la zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon du
T02D1754:218a-11: song bas yang dag par mchod pa dang bstod pa
T02D1754:218a-12: dang bdud rtsi myang ba byas nas bus mo g-yas
T02D1754:218a-14: h'um las lce rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1754:218a-15: lag pa g-yas pas spos snod gzung g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing brjod pa /
T02D1754:218a-16: nag chen rdo rje bcom ldan dpal //
T02D1754:218a-17: rig rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D1754:218a-18: dkyil 'khor snying rje'i sems ldan pas ;
T02D1754:218a-20: 'gro ba rnams la snying rje dang //
T02D1754:218a-21: khyed rnams la ni mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1754:218a-22: da ni gus byed rje btsun la //
T02D1754:218a-23: bka' drin gnang phyir sbyor bar mdzod //
T02D1754:218a-24: gzigs shig bdag la sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1754:218a-26: bzang por zhugs pa'i byang sems dang //
T02D1754:218a-27: gzhan yang sngags kyi lha rnams dang //
T02D1754:218a-28: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D1754:218a-29: 'byung rnams rdzogs sangs rgyas las mnyan //
T02D1754:218a-30: bstan mi 'jig pa'i sems can la //
T02D1754:218a-31: gang zhig de dag snying rje'i mchog / che ge
T02D1754:218a-32: rdo rje chen po bdag / dpal ldan nag chen
T02D1754:218a-33: dkyil 'khor bskyed // ris gcig 'gro rnams dag bya'i phyir //
T02D1754:218a-34: ji ltar nus pas mchod pa las //
T02D1754:218a-35: rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pas //
T02D1754:218a-36: bdag dang slob ma'i tshogs dag dang //
T02D1754:218a-38: ma lus par ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1754:218a-39: brjod cing gsol ba gdab po //
T02D1754:218a-40: 'di ni lha lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:218a-42: // / de nas slob dpon nyid kyis dbang bskur ba'i
T02D1754:218a-43: las kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1754:218a-44: zhugs pa rnams yang dag par mchod nas ye shes
T02D1754:218b-0: kyi thig la sogs pa'i don du @218b dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:218b-1: nam mkhar bteg la shar du kha phyogs te /
T02D1754:218b-2: dpal nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1754:218b-3: gzhon nu mas bsgrims pa'i skud pa lnga tshan lnga
T02D1754:218b-4: la kha dog lnga yis so sor bsgyur te lag
T02D1754:218b-5: pa g-yon pa'i steng du bzhag nas /
T02D1754:218b-6: brum a'am dzr'im kham h'um rnams las rigs lnga rdzogs pas bltas te /
T02D1754:218b-7: las thams cad pa'i mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan
T02D1754:218b-8: pa'i slob mas skud pa bzung ba'i grogs dang bcas
T02D1754:218b-9: pas dang por skud pa lnga tshan so sor re
T02D1754:218b-10: rer bsgrims la / phyi nas de rnams gcig tu bsgrims te gzhan yang de ltar sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1754:218b-11: aom a'a:aa n+yo n+ya nu ga t'a:sarba dharm'a:spar spa r'a
T02D1754:218b-12: nu wishta: sarba dharm'a:a'a ty'a nta aa nu pra wishta:sarba
T02D1754:218b-13: dharm'a:aom a'a:h'um zhes brjod cing bsgrims pa ni srid du
T02D1754:218b-15: sboms su sgo'i nyi shu cha yod pa'i skud pa'o //
T02D1754:218b-16: phyi nas dri dang bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgo bas snod gtsang mar bzhag la /
T02D1754:218b-17: las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsangs nas /
T02D1754:218b-18: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes pa bzlas so //
T02D1754:218b-19: yang dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um phat ces pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02D1754:218b-20: bri bya'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' las gnas pa la
T02D1754:218b-21: aargha dang zhabs bsil sngon du song bas yang dag
T02D1754:218b-22: par mchod nas // bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang phyag btsal te /
T02D1754:218b-23: sgrub pa po nag po chen po'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1754:218b-24: byang phyogs kyis grub pa pos las thams cad ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang /
T02D1754:218b-25: bdag dang de nyid kyi mig g-yas dang g-yon du
T02D1754:218b-26: dza: yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma dang zla
T02D1754:218b-27: ba cung zad ser ba bsams te /
T02D1754:218b-28: rdo rje 'gros kyis bcag pa ni lag pa g-yon
T02D1754:218b-29: po khu tshur bcangs pas skud pa lte bar bzung
T02D1754:218b-30: la / dzdza:'am dza:lan gsum brjod cing btang ngo //
T02D1754:218b-31: byung gi sgrub pa pos kyang skud pa snga ma
T02D1754:218b-32: ltar bzung la dzdza:'am dza:lan gsum brjod cing mdun du
T02D1754:218b-33: phyogs par gnas las dgug par bya'o //
T02D1754:218b-34: nub tu bas dang cig shar du kha blta ba dang /
T02D1754:218b-35: lho ru bsdad cing byang du kha bltas nas /
T02D1754:219a-0: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa mtheb mdzub @219a * //
T02D1754:219a-1: gnyis kyis skud pa bzung la se gol gtogs shing
T02D1754:219a-2: tshangs shig gnyis lte ba'i thad ka'i nam mkha' la
T02D1754:219a-3: btab nas gzhan yang gdab pa ni /
T02D1754:219a-4: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra
T02D1754:219a-5: ma h'um aom sv'a aa:h'a zhes brjod cing gdab bo
T02D1754:219a-6: // nam mkha'i thig ji lta ba bzhin dus la yang tshangs thig gnyis gdab po //
T02D1754:219a-7: gzhan yang de ltar me mtshams dang rlung mtshams kyi
T02D1754:219a-8: thig dang bden bral dang dbang ldan gyi thig kyang
T02D1754:219a-9: gdab po // yang me mtshams su bsdad de byang
T02D1754:219a-10: du kha phyogs pas shar phyogs kyi grub thig dkyil
T02D1754:219a-12: rlung mtshams su bsdad de lhor kha phyogs nas nub phyogs la'o //
T02D1754:219a-13: de nyid du bsdad nas byang phyogs la yang ngo //
T02D1754:219a-14: de nas me mtshams su gnas te nub tu kha phyogs pas lho phyogs la'o //
T02D1754:219a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi brgyad cha dang ldan par bya pa
T02D1754:219a-16: ni tshangs thig gi g-yas dang g-yon gnyis su cha
T02D1754:219a-18: phyi nas rtsa ba'i phyi rol du rim pa ji ltar cha chung gcig dang gnyis pa ste /
T02D1754:219a-19: gnyis dang bzhi rim pa bzhin thig drug la panytsa r'a ga dang 'dod yon dang /
T02D1754:219a-23: kra ma shrirsha rnams kyi snam bu logs la gdab po //
T02D1754:219a-24: tshangs pa'i thig nas cha chung gnyis ma gtogs pa bdun gdab po //
T02D1754:219a-25: ka ba'i steng du cha gnyis la rta babs bgo bar bya'o //
T02D1754:219a-27: rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur ro //
T02D1754:219a-29: rta babs kyi steng du tshangs thig la chos kyi 'khor lo cha chung gnyis pa'o //
T02D1754:219a-30: de'i phyi rol du sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo la cha chung gnyis so //
T02D1754:219a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur pa gdab pa ste /
T02D1754:219a-32: h'um las phur bar bskyed nas /
T02D1754:219a-33: phur pa'i sngags bzlas shing bzung la tho ba'i sngags
T02D1754:219a-34: kyis rdo rje thob brdungs la de la skud pa
T02D1754:219a-35: btags te / dbang ldan mtshams nas g-yas skor du
T02D1754:219a-36: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol nas padma'i ra ba'i
T02D1754:219a-37: don du re khas bskor ro //
T02D1754:219a-38: phyi rol du cha chung gnyis dor bar padma dang rdo rje'i ra ba'i bar gyi re kh'a'o //
T02D1754:219a-39: de las cha chung gnyis dor bar rdo rje'i ra ba dang /
T02D1754:219a-40: me ri'i bar gyi re kh'a'o //
T02D1754:219b-0: de'i phyi rol du me @219b lce mnyam pa'i don du cha chung bzhi dor bas me ri'o //
T02D1754:219b-1: phyi nas rtsa ba'i thig dang tshangs thig gi bar
T02D1754:219b-2: du bskor ba ni tshangs thig nas cha chung lnga
T02D1754:219b-4: de las cha chung gcig la mu khyud do //
T02D1754:219b-5: de'i phyi rol du cha chung bcu 'dab ma'i don du'o //
T02D1754:219b-6: de las cha chung gcig la mu khyud do ;
T02D1754:219b-7: / de'i phyi rol du cha chung gcig la rdo rje'i phreng pa'o //
T02D1754:219b-8: de nas mi dgos pa'i thig rnams dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1754:219b-9: de ltar thig gdab pa zin nas gtor ma dang mchod pa sngon du song bas /
T02D1754:219b-10: aom a'a:h'um badzra mu:zhes brjod de /
T02D1754:219b-11: ye shes kyi thig nam mkha' la gnas pa'i 'khor lo snying gar bstim mo //
T02D1754:219b-12: sa tshon lnga so sor legs par gzhag go //
T02D1754:219b-13: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gi cho ga'o /
T02D1754:219b-15: // / de nas gtor ma byin la /
T02D1754:219b-16: sa tshon dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po
T02D1754:219b-17: dang ljang gu dang nag po rnams rin po che
T02D1754:219b-18: las byas pa'am rdo las byas pa'am /
T02D1754:219b-19: me tog las byas pa rnams la brum a'am dzr'im
T02D1754:219b-20: kham h'um rnams las rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1754:219b-21: par bskyed la / aom badzra tsi tra sa ma
T02D1754:219b-22: ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te
T02D1754:219b-23: par bskyed la / / me tog la sogs pas mchod nas snod gtsang mar bzhag pa dang /
T02D1754:219b-24: de nas dbus kyi phur pa bton te bdag nyid
T02D1754:219b-25: kyi lag pa'i rdo rje la thim par bsam mo
T02D1754:219b-26: // phur khung sa tshon lngas bkang nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsdad la /
T02D1754:219b-27: lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur sa la bzhag ste /
T02D1754:219b-28: aom badzra r'a ga sa ma ya aom a'a:h'um zhes
T02D1754:219b-29: brjod cing dbang ldan mtshams nas shar du kha phyogs
T02D1754:219b-30: te ; / g-yas skor du sa tshon dgye ba ni /
T02D1754:219b-31: der phyi rol gyi re kh'a nas brtsams te /
T02D1754:219b-32: nang gi re kh'a'i bar du sa tshon gyi rtsig
T02D1754:219b-33: pa dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang
T02D1754:219b-34: ljang gu dang nag po rnams bkye la /
T02D1754:219b-35: 'dod yon gser mdog gam padma r'a ga'i kha dog go //
T02D1754:219b-36: sgo khyud rnams dang mtshams rnams su zla ba phyed pa rdo rje rin po che dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1754:219b-37: rin po che'i pha gu dmar po //
T02D1754:219b-38: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa nag po ba
T02D1754:219b-39: ku li dang kra ma sh'irsha la sogs pa rnams
T02D1754:219b-41: rta babs kyi ka ba dang 'khor lo'i nang bla bres kyi 'og gi gzhi phyogs tshon no //
T02D1754:220a-2: ba ra na da la sogs pa ji ltar mdzes par ro //
T02D1754:220a-3: chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas dang bcas pa ser pa'o //
T02D1754:220a-4: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rtse mo dang ra phyogs tshon no //
T02D1754:220a-5: padma'i lte ba ljang gu ge sar ser po'o //
T02D1754:220a-8: rdo rje'i phreng ba sngon po'o //
T02D1754:220a-9: me rigs lnga'i kha dog go //
T02D1754:220a-10: rtsa ba'i thig gi nang du zur gnyis gnyis kyi phyogs bzhi //
T02D1754:220a-11: g-yas g-yon du dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po dang ljang gu rnams su'o //
T02D1754:220a-12: de ltar kha dog gi rim pa shes par bya ste /
T02D1754:220a-14: lte ba la dpal nag po chen po phyag bcu drug pa'i mtshan ma dgod pa ni /
T02D1754:220a-15: sna tshogs padma nyi ma dang bcas pa'i steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa kha gdengs pa'o //
T02D1754:220a-16: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi 'dab ma la gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1754:220a-17: tsa rtsi ka dang dus can ma dang /
T02D1754:220a-18: rigs kyi dbang phyug ma rnams kyi nyi ma la gri gug gis spras pa rnams so //
T02D1754:220a-20: shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhir chom rkun ma dang /
T02D1754:220a-23: dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi sna tshogs padma
T02D1754:220a-24: nyi ma dang bcas pa'i steng du rngam dang spos
T02D1754:220a-25: khang dang rdo rje dril bu rnams so //
T02D1754:220a-26: phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad dgod do //
T02D1754:220a-27: phyi nas h'um zhes bya ba brjod nas las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so //
T02D1754:220a-28: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri'i chus dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rnams la gtor te /
T02D1754:220a-29: aom a'a:h'um badzra mu: zhes pa brjod cing sa tshon
T02D1754:220a-30: lhag ma'i ye shes pa gshegs nas snod du blugs
T02D1754:220a-31: te dpen pa'i gnas su gzhag go //
T02D1754:220a-33: de nas sngon du lhag gnas byas pa'i bum pa
T02D1754:220a-34: rnams g-yas skor gyis dgram pa ni de rnams kyi
T02D1754:220a-35: nang nas gtso bo dang rnam rgyal gyi bum pa
T02D1754:220a-36: gnyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la g-yas skor byas
T02D1754:220a-37: nas me ri'i phyi rol gyi shar sgor stan la
T02D1754:220a-38: bag tsam g-yas su bzhag / g-yon du rim pa
T02D1754:220a-39: bzhin du gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma dang las thams
T02D1754:220a-40: cad pa'i bum pa'i chom rkun ma ste gnyis g-yas
T02D1754:220b-1: lho phyogs su g-yon du tsa rtsi ka dang g-yas su ri mo can no //
T02D1754:220b-2: nub phyogs kyi g-yon du dus can ma dang /
T02D1754:220b-3: g-yas su dga' ba chen mo'o //
T02D1754:220b-4: byang phyogs kyi g-yon du rigs kyi dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1754:220b-5: g-yas su dga' ba'i dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1754:220b-6: chom rkun ma la sogs pa bzhi 'ga' zhig gi mtshams su 'dod de /
T02D1754:220b-7: de ltar na mtshams bzhi'i bum pa rnams dang /
T02D1754:220b-8: mda' bzhi la dar btags pa rnams las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzugs so //
T02D1754:220b-9: 'di ni bum pa dgram pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:220b-11: // / de nas slob dpon dri zhim pos lus la byugs te /
T02D1754:220b-12: dar gyi gos dang thod la rgyan btags pa gon la /
T02D1754:220b-13: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i chus dkyil 'khor bsngags pa dang /
T02D1754:220b-14: yi ge gsum dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1754:220b-15: yang dag par bsrungs te rdo rje dang dril bu
T02D1754:220b-16: bzung la shar gyi sgor kha nub tu phyogs pas
T02D1754:220b-17: bsdad nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i rang bzhin dang ldan
T02D1754:220b-18: pas skad cig gi stong pa'i dang las bris pa'i
T02D1754:220b-19: dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang
T02D1754:220b-21: legs par sbyangs pa'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par 'jug pas sam /
T02D1754:220b-22: yang na ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snyoms par
T02D1754:220b-23: zhugs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgras 'og min nas ye shes
T02D1754:220b-24: pa spyan drangs te zhabs bsil la sogs pa sngon
T02D1754:220b-25: du song bas mchod pa dang bdag nyid la zhugs
T02D1754:220b-26: pas chags pa chen pos zhu nas rdo rje'i lam
T02D1754:220b-27: nas thon te padmar ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i rang
T02D1754:220b-28: bzhin du gyur pa rnams spros pas phyi rol gyi
T02D1754:220b-29: dam tshig gi 'khor lo la rim pa ji lta
T02D1754:220b-30: ba bzhin du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D1754:220b-31: yang rang gi sa bon gyis spyan drangs pa'i lha
T02D1754:220b-32: mos dbang bskur bas gtso bo la mi bskyod pas
T02D1754:220b-33: so // shar la sogs pa na nges pa'i lha
T02D1754:220b-34: mo brgyad rnams la rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D1754:220b-35: pa rnams kyis go rims bzhin du rgyas gdab bo
T02D1754:220b-36: so // // phyi nas sems kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa'i lha mo spros te /
T02D1754:220b-37: mchod la na bza' dang bla re phul te /
T02D1754:221a-1: gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
T02D1754:221a-2: dang bldag pa dang gzhib pa dang btung ba rnams
T02D1754:221a-3: kyis mchod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1754:221a-4: gser dang bu mo dang rta dang glang po dang ba lang la sogs pa rnams phul la /
T02D1754:221a-5: gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa lta bu'i phyi
T02D1754:221a-6: rol gyi rnal 'byor ma bcu drug gam brgyad dam
T02D1754:221a-7: bzhi rnams kyis rang rang gi mchod pas mchod do
T02D1754:221a-8: // dril bu dkrol zhing bstod pa byas nas bdud
T02D1754:221a-9: rtsi myangs pas bde pa chen po'i ro myong bar
T02D1754:221a-10: // bsam mo // de nas gtso bo'i sngags brgya
T02D1754:221a-11: rtsa brgyad dang 'khor rnams kyi nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1754:221a-12: bzlas pa dang 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshogs 'byung po
T02D1754:221a-13: rnams kyi gtor ma sbyin no //
T02D1754:221a-14: 'di ni dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:221a-16: // / de nas slob ma rnams kyis mandala byas la /
T02D1754:221a-17: pus mo sa la btsugs te me tog dang bcas
T02D1754:221a-18: pa'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags kyi theg pa la
T02D1754:221a-19: sbyor ba rnams la 'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma
T02D1754:221a-20: bde bar bya ba'i don du ma yin par 'on
T02D1754:221a-21: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob par bya ba'i
T02D1754:221a-22: phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'dod pa gnyis bsgrub
T02D1754:221a-23: po snyam du shes par byas la /
T02D1754:221a-24: bla ma la kha phyogs pa de rnams zhal du
T02D1754:221a-25: zhugs te rdo rje'i lam nas padmar son pa rnams
T02D1754:221a-26: la 'od zer gyis shas rab dang bcas pa'i de
T02D1754:221a-27: bzhin gshegs pa rnams spyan drangs te zhu nas snga
T02D1754:221a-28: ma ltar zhugs pas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing shar
T02D1754:221a-29: gyi sgor bstan pa de ye shes dbab pa'i rjes
T02D1754:221a-30: gnang blang ngo // dpal chen khyod bdag ston pa po //
T02D1754:221a-31: au mas stabs cig kha sbyor khyod //
T02D1754:221a-32: byang chub chen pos tshul bstan pa //
T02D1754:221a-33: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D1754:221a-34: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D1754:221a-35: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1754:221a-36: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //
T02D1754:221a-37: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D1754:221a-38: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D1754:221a-39: mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol //
T02D1754:221a-40: zhes brjod la slob ma gcig gtso bor byas te /
T02D1754:221a-41: bu tshur theg pa chen po la //
T02D1754:221a-42: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba'i //
T02D1754:221b-0: @221b khyod ni tshul chen snod yin pas //
T02D1754:221b-1: khyod la yang dag bshad par bya //
T02D1754:221b-2: dus gsum sangs rgyas yang dag rnams //
T02D1754:221b-3: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
T02D1754:221b-4: dbyer med gsang sngags nus mthu yis //
T02D1754:221b-5: mnyam med yang dag ye shes thob //
T02D1754:221b-6: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pas ;
T02D1754:221b-7: / bdud kyi sde ni 'jigs ster ba //
T02D1754:221b-8: gang gis stobs chen gyis bcom nas //
T02D1754:221b-9: sh'akya seng ge la sogs mchog /'jig rten bsam pa mkhyen pa yin //
T02D1754:221b-11: de phyir bu khyod blo gros 'di //
T02D1754:221b-12: gyis shig thams cad mkhyen thob phyir ;
T02D1754:221b-13: / zhes brjod la don blang ngo //
T02D1754:221b-15: dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1754:221b-16: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1754:221b-17: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1754:221b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1754:221b-19: zhes pa lan gsum brjod nas /
T02D1754:221b-20: spyi'i sdom pa bzung ba dang rdo rje slob dpon gyi sdom pa blang ba'i phyir /
T02D1754:221b-21: 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang //
T02D1754:221b-22: byin cig mgon po bdag brjod kyi //
T02D1754:221b-23: 'khor lo lha yi de nyid gnyis //
T02D1754:221b-24: slob dpon las ni bya ba kun //
T02D1754:221b-25: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshig la //
T02D1754:221b-26: gsang ba'i sdom pa dam pa rnams //
T02D1754:221b-27: sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir //
T02D1754:221b-28: rtag par bdag nyid slob dpon gyur //
T02D1754:221b-29: de ltar bye brag gi gsol ba btab la //
T02D1754:221b-30: de nas sems bskyed par bya ste /
T02D1754:221b-31: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol /
T02D1754:221b-32: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D1754:221b-33: ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar la /
T02D1754:221b-34: ji ltar dus gsum mgon rnams kyis //
T02D1754:221b-35: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad ltar //
T02D1754:221b-36: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D1754:221b-37: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1754:221b-38: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la //
T02D1754:221b-39: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D1754:221b-40: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02D1754:221b-41: sems can dan byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D1754:221b-42: bdag gis brtan par gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:221b-43: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D1754:221b-44: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D1754:222a-1: nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-2: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1754:222a-3: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D1754:222a-4: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-5: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-6: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1754:222a-7: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D1754:222a-8: nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu //
T02D1754:222a-9: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin //
T02D1754:222a-10: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02D1754:222a-11: padma'i rigs can dag pa la //
T02D1754:222a-12: phyi nang gsang pa theg pa gsum //
T02D1754:222a-13: dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-14: las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02D1754:222a-15: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
T02D1754:222a-16: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-17: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-18: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D1754:222a-19: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas //
T02D1754:222a-20: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1754:222a-21: bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung //
T02D1754:222a-22: ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-23: ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi //
T02D1754:222a-24: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //
T02D1754:222a-25: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D1754:222a-26: de ltar brjod nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1754:222a-27: de'i snying ga dang mgrin pa dang spyi bo rnams
T02D1754:222a-28: su rdo rje padma 'khor lo rnams kyi steng du
T02D1754:222a-30: de rnams brjod cing snying ga dang mgrin pa dang
T02D1754:222a-31: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang bcas pa'i dri
T02D1754:222a-32: chu lag pa g-yas pas reg ste /
T02D1754:222a-33: me tog mgo la bdug spos dang mar me mdun
T02D1754:222a-34: du dri chab thugs la bshos gtsang phyag tu bul
T02D1754:222a-35: nas / byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa las
T02D1754:222a-36: byas pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa me tog
T02D1754:222a-37: dang ldan pa slob ma la sbyin no //
T02D1754:222a-38: de nas mandala pa'i ko ba tsam pa'i gru bzhi pa la /
T02D1754:222a-39: shar ram byang du kha phyogs nas so shing sos bzung la der dor ro //
T02D1754:222a-40: de'i shar dang byang dang nub dang lho dang steng
T02D1754:222a-41: dang log rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1754:222a-42: zhib dang mngon spyod dang dbang dang rgyas pa dang
T02D1754:222a-43: / rig pa 'dzin pa dang sa 'og gi dngos grub rnams so //
T02D1754:222a-44: mandala gyi phyi rol du song na dngos grub mi 'byung ngo //
T02D1754:222a-45: de nas bam las byung ba'i chur bskyed la zhabs bsil sbyin no //
T02D1754:222b-0: yang aom hr'i:bi shuddha dharma sarba p'a pham nam @222b
T02D1754:222b-1: tsasya bi shodha ya sarba bi kalp'a n'a pa n'a
T02D1754:222b-2: ya h'um zhes brjod cing dri'i chu khyor ba gsum
T02D1754:222b-3: blud do // de nas bsdad pa de la h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ku sha stan dang /
T02D1754:222b-4: dhi:yis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ku sha sngags su byin nas /
T02D1754:222b-5: de rnams kyi lus dang mnyam pa'i skud pa dmar
T02D1754:222b-6: po sum sgril byas pa la h'um gis byin gyis
T02D1754:222b-7: brlabs te las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing mdud
T02D1754:222b-9: de'i lag pa g-yas pa'i dpung pa'am g-yon pa'i mkhrig ma la btags pa dang /
T02D1754:222b-10: legs par bsrungs la gzengs bstod pa ni /
T02D1754:222b-11: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D1754:222b-12: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhen //
T02D1754:222b-13: brgya lam na ni ris 'ga' zhig /'byung bar 'gyur ram 'byung mi 'gyur //
T02D1754:222b-14: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D1754:222b-15: de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste //
T02D1754:222b-16: gang gi mnyam med sems can don //
T02D1754:222b-17: mya ngan mi 'da' byed bar nus //
T02D1754:222b-18: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D1754:222b-19: sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang //
T02D1754:222b-22: grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i //
T02D1754:222b-23: tshul la gnas na smos ci 'tshal //
T02D1754:222b-24: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02D1754:222b-26: gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la //
T02D1754:222b-27: blo gros shin tu mi g-yo ba //
T02D1754:222b-28: de dag gi ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu //
T02D1754:222b-29: sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu gcod //
T02D1754:222b-30: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D1754:222b-31: rnyed pa mnyam med di ring rnyed //
T02D1754:222b-32: gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa //
T02D1754:222b-33: bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni //
T02D1754:222b-34: bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun //
T02D1754:222b-35: yongs su bzung ste skye bzhin pa //
T02D1754:222b-36: de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D1754:222b-37: sad ni rab tu skye bar bya //
T02D1754:222b-38: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D1754:222b-39: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D1754:222b-40: khyed rnams der ni 'gro bas na //
T02D1754:222b-41: rang byung skal pa chen po la //
T02D1754:222b-42: 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi //
T02D1754:222b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur //
T02D1754:222b-44: zhes brjod de bshad la yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D1754:222b-45: nang par snga bar rmi lam zlos shig ces brjod
T02D1754:223a-0: nas ku sha dang bcas par seng ge @223a *
T02D1754:223a-2: de nas rang nyid dkyil 'khor du zhugs la srung
T02D1754:223a-3: ba'i don du las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas so
T02D1754:223a-4: // 'di ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:223a-6: // / de nas nang par snga bar gtor ma btang la dkyil 'khor nas thon pa dang//
T02D1754:223a-7: slob ma rnams la rmi lam dris te /
T02D1754:223a-8: ri las lhung ba la sogs pa'i mi dge ba'i
T02D1754:223a-9: rmi lam byung na las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1754:223a-10: bsrungs la dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su slob
T02D1754:223a-11: mas gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1754:223a-12: 'jug pa ni bskor ba byed cing 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02D1754:223a-13: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bzhin du 'khor lo'i gtso bo slob dpon du bsams la /
T02D1754:223a-14: des byin pa rnams la phyis bskur ba'i dbang thams
T02D1754:223a-15: cad la rim pa ji lta bar rdo rje slob
T02D1754:223a-16: dpon gyi bya ba byas te rjes gnang thob pa
T02D1754:223a-17: dang / slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir bden pa'i byin rlabs byas te /
T02D1754:223a-18: chos rnams gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1754:223a-19: gsal dag dri med rnyog spangs pa'i //
T02D1754:223a-20: gzung du med cing brjod bral ba //
T02D1754:223a-21: rgyu dang las las byung ba ste //
T02D1754:223a-22: de bzhin de nyid las byung ba //
T02D1754:223a-24: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma rnams //
T02D1754:223a-25: sdig pa bral kun thams cad ltos //
T02D1754:223a-27: 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:223a-29: // / de nas lhag gnas byas pa'i slob ma rnams khrus byas te /
T02D1754:223a-30: dri zhim po la sogs pas lus la bsgos pa dang /
T02D1754:223a-31: yol ba'i phyi rol du rnam par snang mdzad du
T02D1754:223a-32: bskyed nas las thams cad pa'i sngags bzlas shing dang
T02D1754:223a-34: aom tsakshu bandha bar ma na ya h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyis mig ras bcing ngo //
T02D1754:223a-35: a'a kham w'i ra h'um zhes pa brjod de me tog blangs nas yon dbul lo //
T02D1754:223a-36: las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la /
T02D1754:223a-37: de'i lus yi ge gsum gyis 'od zer du gyur par bsams te /
T02D1754:223a-38: yi ge gsum brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi shar du gnas pa de las kyi rdo rjes bzung la /
T02D1754:223a-40: bde chen dga' khyod su yin gyi //
T02D1754:223b-0: bde chen skal @223b bzang bdag lags so //
T02D1754:223b-1: de nas aom sarba yo ga tsittam au p'a da
T02D1754:223b-2: y'a mi zhes brjod byang chub tu sems bskyed la
T02D1754:223b-3: me tog dang ldan pa'i rdo rje snying gar bzhag
T02D1754:223b-4: la / aom su ra te sa ma ya stam ho:siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes brjod de /
T02D1754:223b-5: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin
T02D1754:223b-6: gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1754:223b-8: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams dang dad pa dang
T02D1754:223b-9: mi ldan pa rnams la smra bar ma byed cig
T02D1754:223b-10: ces pa dang / h'um dza:h'um zhes brjod cing dgug
T02D1754:223b-11: pa ni a'a kham b'i ra h'um zhes pas yol
T02D1754:223b-12: ba'i nang du bcug nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor
T02D1754:223b-13: ces pa dang / bzung la / der khyod de
T02D1754:223b-14: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs pas
T02D1754:223b-15: deng ngas khyod rdo rje ye shes bskyed de /
T02D1754:223b-16: ye shes bskyed pas khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1754:223b-17: thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob na dngos grub
T02D1754:223b-19: dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi sngon du smras
T02D1754:223b-20: na dam tshig nyams nas 'bras bu mi 'byung ngo
T02D1754:223b-21: zhes brjod la / mgor rdo rje bzung la dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02D1754:223b-22: 'di khyod dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02D1754:223b-23: gal te khyod 'di gang dag la //
T02D1754:223b-25: de ltar go bar byas te snying gar rdo rje bzung la /
T02D1754:223b-26: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //
T02D1754:223b-27: snying la yang dag zhugs pa ste //
T02D1754:223b-28: gal te tshul 'di smra gyur na //
T02D1754:223b-29: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1754:223b-31: rnam rgyal bum pa'i steng gi chu blangs la de la sbyin pa ni /
T02D1754:223b-32: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1754:223b-34: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D1754:223b-35: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis thob //
T02D1754:223b-36: ces brjod de mna' chu blud do //
T02D1754:223b-37: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje
T02D1754:223b-38: nga yin pas ngas khyod la gang bsgo ba de
T02D1754:223b-42: // / gal te khyod kyis nga la brnyas pa byas na
T02D1754:223b-43: 'jigs pa chen po ma spangs par dus byas nas
T02D1754:223b-44: shi nas dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1754:223b-45: 'di ni dam tshig gi chu sbyin pa'o //
T02D1754:223b-46: de nas mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa lhag
T02D1754:223b-47: par gnas pa thob pa'i slob ma skad cig gis
T02D1754:224a-1: a'a:las 'od dpag med du bskyed la de bzhin gshegs
T02D1754:224a-2: pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig / rdo
T02D1754:224a-3: rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces
T02D1754:224a-5: de'i snying gar lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ser po
T02D1754:224a-6: gru bzhi pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'i steng du nyi
T02D1754:224a-7: ma la sa h'um nag po spyi bor h'um bam
T02D1754:224a-8: las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas
T02D1754:224a-9: mtshan pa'i steng du zla ba la h'um dkar po
T02D1754:224a-10: / mgrin par yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag
T02D1754:224a-11: po gzhu'i dbyibs lta bu ba dan dang bcas pa
T02D1754:224a-12: / la / zla ba'i steng du a'a:dmar po rnams dmigs te /
T02D1754:224a-13: rkang ba'i 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sbar
T02D1754:224a-14: ba ni ram las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zur
T02D1754:224a-15: gsum pa 'od zer 'phro bzhin pa la gnas pa
T02D1754:224a-16: / dzheem dmar pos slob ma steng du bskyod par
T02D1754:224a-17: bsam pa ni bdug spos kyis bdugs pa dang dril
T02D1754:224a-19: a'a be sha ya stvam bha ya ra ra ra ra /
T02D1754:224a-20: tsa la ya tsa la ya /
T02D1754:224a-21: h'um ha dzhee a'a:zhes pa'i sngags brjod cing bsam gtan dang ldan pas dbab par bya'o //
T02D1754:224a-22: 'bebs pa'i dus su de'i lce las a'a; dmar po bsams te /
T02D1754:224a-23: smros shig rdo rje bu khyod kye zhes brjod pas
T02D1754:224a-24: des dge ba dang mi dge ba nges par smra'o
T02D1754:224a-25: // de nas phab pa'i lha rang gi sa bon
T02D1754:224a-26: las bsdus ba slob ma'i mgo la rdo rje bzung
T02D1754:224a-27: // ste / h'um ha a'a dzheem mu:zhes pas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1754:224a-30: // / de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor la kha phyogs
T02D1754:224a-31: te gnas pa la mig sngar ci snang dris pa
T02D1754:224a-32: dang / des smras pa'i kha dog gi bye brag
T02D1754:224a-33: gis dngos grub kyi bye brag shes par byas la
T02D1754:224a-34: bden pa'i byin rlabs bya ba ni /
T02D1754:224a-36: nga yis slob ma gzhug par bya //
T02D1754:224a-37: lha rnams rigs ni rim pa yis //
T02D1754:224a-38: 'di yis dngos grub ji lta bar ;
T02D1754:224a-39: / rang gi rigs ni gar yin pa //
T02D1754:224a-40: bsod nams ji bzhin de yis thob //
T02D1754:224a-41: ji ltar bsod nams bsags pa yis //
T02D1754:224a-43: zhes pa 'di ni dkyil 'khor la mig ras dang bcas te 'jug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:224b-0: // / de nas snga ma'i me @224b tog gi phreng
T02D1754:224b-1: ba la pra t'itstsha badzra ho:zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor
T02D1754:224b-2: la dor te / re kh'a lnga'i nang la me
T02D1754:224b-3: tog babs pa'i sa yis de'i rigs shes par bya
T02D1754:224b-6: mgo bo'am spyi gtsug rnams su phog na phyag rgya
T02D1754:224b-7: chen po dang mig gam kha la sogs pa ro
T02D1754:224b-8: stod du phog na mchog dang /
T02D1754:224b-10: ro smad du phog na tha ma'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02D1754:224b-11: de lta bu la sogs par go bar bya'o //
T02D1754:224b-12: 'di ni me tog dor ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1754:224b-13: de nas mig gnyis la aom gnyis bsams la /
T02D1754:224b-14: khyod ni di ring rdor sems kyis //
T02D1754:224b-15: mig 'byed par ni brtson pa ste //
T02D1754:224b-16: rdo rje mig ni bla na med //
T02D1754:224b-17: khyod kyi mig rnams dbye bar bya //
T02D1754:224b-18: zhes brjod la mig ras bshu ba'o //
T02D1754:224b-20: rdo rje kye khyod dkyil 'khor ltos //
T02D1754:224b-21: zhes brjod la dkyil 'khor bstan te slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug go //
T02D1754:224b-22: phyi nas chu'i dbang gi don du bla ma la ji ltar 'byor ba'i yon phul te /
T02D1754:224b-23: pus mo sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar la //
T02D1754:224b-24: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D1754:224b-25: ji ltar byin pas bsnyen bkur ltar //
T02D1754:224b-26: bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don du ni //
T02D1754:224b-27: nam mkha' rdor sogs bdag la byin //
T02D1754:224b-28: zhes brjod la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D1754:224b-29: de nas bla mas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa dang /
T02D1754:224b-30: rig pa'i lha mo rnams yang dag par mchod nas
T02D1754:224b-31: gsol ba btab pas phyag rgya dang bcas pa de
T02D1754:224b-32: rnams chags pa chen pos zhu nas tshangs pa'i bu
T02D1754:224b-33: gnas zhugs te ; / rdo rje'i lam nas thon
T02D1754:224b-34: pa des lha mo'i padmar slob ma mi bskyod pa'i
T02D1754:224b-35: gzugs su zhal nas zhugs pa la dbang bskur nas
T02D1754:224b-36: gnas zhugs te ; / yang zhal ras la sogs pa snga ma ltar padma nas phyung ste /
T02D1754:224b-37: nam mkha' la gshegs pa ni spyan ma la sogs
T02D1754:224b-38: pa'i rig ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis bum pa
T02D1754:224b-39: dkar po byang sems kyis gang ba bzung nas /
T02D1754:224b-40: padma nas phyung ba'i slob ma dbang bskur bar 'dod
T02D1754:224b-41: pa de la gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pas
T02D1754:224b-42: bkra shis kyi glu len cing dbang bskur bar bsam
T02D1754:225a-0: zhing rnam rgyal la sogs pa'i bum pa @225a *
T02D1754:225a-2: nyung zad re thod pa'am las thams cad pa'i bum par gzung ste /
T02D1754:225a-3: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur ba ni /
T02D1754:225a-4: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1754:225a-5: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1754:225a-6: byin cig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1754:225a-7: gsang ba gsum gyi skye gnas rnams //
T02D1754:225a-8: aom a'a:badzro da ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um su ra
T02D1754:225a-9: ta stvam aa ham zhes brjod cing dbang bskur ro
T02D1754:225a-10: // 'di ni chu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225a-12: // / de nas slob ma de nyid rin chen 'byung ldan du bsams la /
T02D1754:225a-13: gser ram ras la sogs pa las byas pa'i chod pan de'i mgo la bzhag ste sngar gyi /
T02D1754:225a-14: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1754:225a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad dang /
T02D1754:225a-16: aom a'a:badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D1754:225a-17: 'di ni chod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225a-19: // / de nas de nyid dang rdo rje gnyis ka 'od dpag med du bsams la /
T02D1754:225a-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdor 'chang las //
T02D1754:225a-21: kun gyis kyang ni de bzung ltar //
T02D1754:225a-22: de ring khyod ni dbang bskur te //
T02D1754:225a-23: rdo rje dngos grub bzang thob phyir //
T02D1754:225a-24: zhes brjod cing rdo rje snying ga dang /
T02D1754:225a-25: mgrin pa dang spyi bor bzhag la lag pa g-yas par gtad do //
T02D1754:225a-26: 'di ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225a-28: // / de nas de nyid dang dril bu gnyis don
T02D1754:225a-29: yod grub par bsams la de'i lag pa g-yon du
T02D1754:225a-30: gtad pa dang / rdo rje dang dril bu ldan pa'i lag pas 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya bya ste /
T02D1754:225a-31: aom badzra ai dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinyts'a
T02D1754:225a-32: mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod do
T02D1754:225a-33: // 'di ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225a-35: // / de nas de nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsams la /
T02D1754:225a-36: spyi bor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par bzung la /
T02D1754:225a-37: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi
T02D1754:225a-38: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta zhes pa
T02D1754:225a-39: dang / zhe sdang rdo rje sems dpa' la //
T02D1754:225a-41: me tog lhung ba'i rigs kyi ming gdags shing rnam
T02D1754:225a-42: par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin du dbang bskur ro
T02D1754:225a-43: // 'di ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225a-45: // / bdag gi thugs rje'i gnas yin pas //
T02D1754:225a-46: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bdag kyi //
T02D1754:225a-47: bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don gyi phyir //
T02D1754:225a-48: bdag la khyod kyi bka' drin stsol//
T02D1754:225b-0: @225b zhes pa bla mas slob ma la gsol ba
T02D1754:225b-1: 'debs su gzhug cing h'um las rdo rje sems dpar
T02D1754:225b-2: bskyed la // thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1754:225b-3: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D1754:225b-4: kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1754:225b-5: rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //
T02D1754:225b-6: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon
T02D1754:225b-7: du 'gro ba'i de kho nar bshad de rdo rje'i
T02D1754:225b-8: dam tshig go // de nas yi ge aa: las dril bur bskyed la //
T02D1754:225b-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1754:225b-10: dril bu'i dbang gis rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D1754:225b-11: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D1754:225b-12: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1754:225b-13: de ltar brjod cing de kho nas blang ngo //
T02D1754:225b-14: de nas slob mas 'di ltar brjod cing //
T02D1754:225b-15: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis dngos byas pa //
T02D1754:225b-16: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1754:225b-17: srid pa dam pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D1754:225b-19: 'di ni dril bu'i dam tshig go ;
T02D1754:225b-21: phyag rgya'i dam tshig bshad bya ste //
T02D1754:225b-22: yid kyi rang bzhin brtan byas la //
T02D1754:225b-23: lus kyang thams cad brtan byas pas //
T02D1754:225b-24: de ni phyag rgyar bshad pa'o //
T02D1754:225b-25: de ltar ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pas /
T02D1754:225b-26: 'dod pa thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa dang /
T02D1754:225b-27: dngos grub thams cad grub par gyur cig par mos la /
T02D1754:225b-28: ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang kha sbyor gyi rim par byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1754:225b-29: 'khyud pa'i tshul dbyer med par bya ba ni phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste /
T02D1754:225b-30: 'di ni dam tshig gsum gyi cho ga'o /
T02D1754:225b-32: // / de nas dam tshig gsum blang ba de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bar bsams la /
T02D1754:225b-33: chu'i dbang gi skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga brjod nas /
T02D1754:225b-34: aom a'a:saerba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D1754:225b-35: ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes
T02D1754:225b-37: de nas mi bskyod pa dbu la bsams te /
T02D1754:225b-38: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'ah'a zhes pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D1754:225b-39: de la me tog la sogs pa dbul lo //
T02D1754:225b-40: de nas bsdus la dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid dang rnam par dag par bshad do //
T02D1754:225b-42: yid kyi dkyil 'khor ngo mtshar che //
T02D1754:225b-43: gzhal yas khang ni shes pa ste /
T02D1754:226a-0: @226a * // sems kyi yar la langs phyir ro //
T02D1754:226a-1: phung po lnga po bsdus pa yis //
T02D1754:226a-2: sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1754:226a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa slob dpon gyi rim pa'o //
T02D1754:226a-4: de nas dpal nag po chen po'i snying po'i sngags gsum mam brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /
T02D1754:226a-5: nga yis byin pa'i bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1754:226a-6: 'di la nye bar gnas par gyis //
T02D1754:226a-8: slob mas kyang 'di ltar brjod do //
T02D1754:226a-9: nga yis blang bya rje btsun kyi //
T02D1754:226a-10: bdag la nye bar gnas gyur cig / ces pa
T02D1754:226a-11: lan gsum brjod de blang ba sngags kyi rjes gnang
T02D1754:226a-12: ngo // de nas gser ram dngul las byas pa'i
T02D1754:226a-13: snod du mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman bzung la
T02D1754:226a-14: ngo // / gser gyi thur mas slob ma'i mig la bram bsams te /
T02D1754:226a-15: aom badzra nee tra aa pa ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:zhes brjod cing dbye'o //
T02D1754:226a-16: 'di ni mig sman gyi rim pa'o //
T02D1754:226a-17: de nas aa:brjod cing me long bzung nas slob ma la bstan pa ni /
T02D1754:226a-18: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1754:226a-19: dag cing gsal la 'dres pa med //
T02D1754:226a-20: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D1754:226a-21: rgyu dang las las kun tu 'byung //
T02D1754:226a-22: me long lta bur rdor sems khyod //
T02D1754:226a-23: dag cing gsal la 'dres med par //
T02D1754:226a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi rje bo de //
T02D1754:226a-25: bu khyod snying la yang dag gnas//
T02D1754:226a-26: ngo bo nyid kyi gnas med par //
T02D1754:226a-27: de ltar chos 'di shes gyis la //
T02D1754:226a-28: sems can don ni mnyam med gyis //
T02D1754:226a-29: skyob pa'i thugs las byung ba'o //
T02D1754:226a-30: zhes brjod pa ni me long gi dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D1754:226a-31: de nas yi ge ho:las gzhur bskyed la de nyid gtad pa ni /
T02D1754:226a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ;
T02D1754:226a-33: /'di yis bde ba bskyed par gyis //
T02D1754:226a-35: slob mas kyang ni brjod pa //
T02D1754:226a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir //
T02D1754:226a-37: de yis bde ba bskyed par bgyi //
T02D1754:226a-38: zhes pa dang bcas pas bgegs thams cad la bsnun
T02D1754:226a-39: par bsam zhing phyogs bzhi dang steng dang 'og tu
T02D1754:226a-40: mda' dang bcas pas bsnun no //
T02D1754:226a-41: 'di ni mda' gzhus bsnun pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1754:226a-42: de nas yol ba la sogs par dben par byas la /
T02D1754:226a-43: gzhon nu ma dam tshig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1754:226a-44: gsang ba'i dbang gi don du bla ma la phul
T02D1754:226b-0: la / slob mas thal mo sbyar te bla ma rdo rje 'dzin par bsams @226b la ;
T02D1754:226b-1: / khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02D1754:226b-2: bdag gis bla med byed pa thob //
T02D1754:226b-3: de phyir gsang ba'i dbang bskur la //
T02D1754:226b-4: mgon po nyid kyis gzung du gsol //
T02D1754:226b-5: zhes pa brjod la gsol ba gdab pa'o //
T02D1754:226b-6: de nas bla mas gtso bo'i nga rgyal byas la /
T02D1754:226b-7: des lha mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas rdo rje dang
T02D1754:226b-8: padma byin gyis brlabs pa sngon du song bas snyoms
T02D1754:226b-9: par zhugs te / lhan cig skyes pa brtan par byas nas /
T02D1754:226b-10: mthe bong dang srin lag gis byang sems bzung ste
T02D1754:226b-11: gsung rdo rje'i gzugs su slob ma'i khar dbab po
T02D1754:226b-12: // de nas kyang kye ma bde'o zhes brjod la btung ngo //
T02D1754:226b-13: de nas phyag rgya langs te padma'i bcud kyi thig le de'i khar dbab po //
T02D1754:226b-14: des kyang de ltar btung bar bya'o //
T02D1754:226b-15: 'di ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga'o /
T02D1754:226b-17: // / de nas de nyid dam gzhan dam tshig dang
T02D1754:226b-18: sdom pa gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan pa btsal
T02D1754:226b-19: la / byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la ;
T02D1754:226b-20: / zhes pa la sogs pas slob mas gsol ba btab pa la //
T02D1754:226b-22: sangs rgyas rab brtags brten pa ste //
T02D1754:226b-23: 'khor lo'i rim pa rab sbyor bas //
T02D1754:226b-24: rdo rje'i lus gnas byang sems de //
T02D1754:226b-25: nor bu gnas la sems pa'o //
T02D1754:226b-26: bde ba dam pa'i dam tshig myong //
T02D1754:226b-28: des kyang gur gum la sogs pa'i dri yis byugs te gos spangs nas padma bstan cing //
T02D1754:226b-29: kye ma nga yi padma la //
T02D1754:226b-30: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02D1754:226b-31: gang gis cho gas brten pa yis //
T02D1754:226b-32: de ming la gnas pas na //
T02D1754:226b-33: padma la ni ji bzhin spyod //
T02D1754:226b-34: sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod sogs phyir //
T02D1754:226b-35: bde chen rgyal po'i bdag nyid ni //
T02D1754:226b-36: gang zhig 'di las dus kun bstan //
T02D1754:226b-37: bhanydza mo ksha ho:zhes brjod do //
T02D1754:226b-38: des kyang rang dang phyag rgya gnyis lha dang lha mor bskyed la /
T02D1754:226b-39: h'um gnyis las padma dang rdo rje gnyis so ;
T02D1754:226b-40: / ge sar dang bum pa gnyis a'a:dang aom las so //
T02D1754:226b-41: rdo rje'i bu gar phat ser po bsams te /
T02D1754:226b-42: rdo rje dbyibs kyi dbang phyug rtsa //
T02D1754:226b-43: g-yon gyi bha ga'i g-yon na gnas //
T02D1754:226b-44: mdzub mo cung zad bskyed par bya //
T02D1754:226b-45: shes nas de ni bla tshig blang //
T02D1754:227a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga @227a * //
T02D1754:227a-1: na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham zhes pas bde ba'i don du'o //
T02D1754:227a-2: shes rab dang sbyar dpal dang bcas //
T02D1754:227a-3: de nyid yang dag mtshon par byed //
T02D1754:227a-4: rdo rje'i lus gnas byang sems te //
T02D1754:227a-5: nor bur gnas la sems pa'o //
T02D1754:227a-6: de ltar bsam zhing yang dag par bzung nas dkyil
T02D1754:227a-7: 'khor gyis btang ba padma nas lces blangs la de
T02D1754:227a-9: dam tshig gi rang bzhin du btung bar bya'o //
T02D1754:227a-10: 'di ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi cho ga'o /
T02D1754:227a-12: // / de nas tshig dbang bzhi pa byin pa dang /
T02D1754:227a-13: shes rab ye shes kyi dus su byang chub sems
T02D1754:227a-14: kyi myu gu skyes pa des bsgoms pas sgrib pa
T02D1754:227a-15: dang bral ba ni chos thams cad bsam du med
T02D1754:227a-16: pa phyag rgya chen po'i sku rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1754:227a-17: chen po'i rang bzhin ni dbang bzhi pa'i sku'i ngo
T02D1754:227a-18: bo'o // 'di ni dbang bzhi pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:227a-20: // / de nas de'i lag pa slob ma'i lag par gtad la /
T02D1754:227a-21: de phyir sangs rgyas dngos bya ste //
T02D1754:227a-22: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas med //
T02D1754:227a-24: de phyir rnam par sbyor ba 'di //
T02D1754:227a-25: khyod kyis nam yang 'bral ma byed //
T02D1754:227a-26: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1754:227a-27: rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pas //
T02D1754:227a-29: dngos grub dam pa de la med //
T02D1754:227a-30: ces brjod pa 'di ni rig pa brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1754:227a-32: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bskyed pa de //
T02D1754:227a-33: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus //
T02D1754:227a-34: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02D1754:227a-35: khyod kyis kyang ni rgyun bzung na //
T02D1754:227a-36: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D1754:227a-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam dh'a ra ya mi /
T02D1754:227a-39: badzra satva h'i:hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod cing
T02D1754:227a-40: blang ba 'di ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin pa'i
T02D1754:227a-42: / de nas snying po'i sngags kyis kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D1754:227a-44: thod pa la sogs pa rnams la len gsum bzlas te /
T02D1754:227a-45: kha tv'am da ma ru thod pa rnams //
T02D1754:227a-46: rdor sems phyag rgya 'di yin pas //
T02D1754:227a-47: gtad pas 'di bzung dpa' bo kye //
T02D1754:227a-48: phyi dang nang du brtan gyur cig / ces pa brjod cing bzung ba dang /

T02D1754:227b-17: // / de nas slob ma la dung dang dril bu dang pu sti rnams gtad pa de la //
